mapper.select: select * from sys_menu where parent_id = #{parentId} order by order_num asc
select * from sys_menu where type != 2 order by order_num asc

select count(*) from sys_menu m
AND (select p.name from sys_menu p where p.menu_id = m.parent_id) like concat('%',#{parentName},'%')
AND m.name like concat('%',#{menuName},'%')
